source_document.title: Regia Aeronautica - El Alamein and Withdrawal

aggregate_strength.note: Aggregate from El Alamein battle records. Total Axis: 350 aircraft, Italian = 55% (German = 45%). Progressively withdrawn from Egypt → Tobruk → Benghazi → Tripoli → Tunisia following Panzerarmee Afrika defeat. Heavy losses during retreat.
aggregate_strength.data_source: Second Battle of El Alamein records

sources: Wikipedia - Second Battle of El Alamein (October 1942: 350 Axis total)
Italian component = 55% of Axis air strength
Progressive withdrawal: Egypt → Tobruk → Benghazi → Tripoli → Tunisia
metadata.extraction_method: Battle records calculation from Axis totals
metadata.notes: At El Alamein (Oct 23-Nov 11), total Axis 350 aircraft. Italian component ~55% = 193 aircraft, ~70% operational = 135 aircraft. After defeat, Regia Aeronautica withdrawn progressively westward. By December, concentrated in Tunisia. Heavy losses during retreat reduced operational strength. Supply difficulties throughout period.
metadata.future_enhancement: Italian Ufficio Storico for withdrawal timeline and unit losses
